name: Research Knowledge Base
description: Server providing full CRUD access to a threat research knowledge base through 11 specialized tools: search, read, create, update, delete, list, tags, backlinks, templates, and vault structure — making all research AI-searchable and cross-referenceable.
impact: Unified AI-searchable knowledge base across all threat research — campaign notes, IOCs, MITRE mappings, and detection rules in one queryable repository
